<a id="SkeletonModification2DLookAt"></a>

# SkeletonModification2DLookAt

**Experimental:** This class may be changed or removed in future versions.

**Inherits:** [SkeletonModification2D](SkeletonModification2D.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A modification that rotates a [Bone2D](Bone2D.md) node to look at a target.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This [SkeletonModification2D](SkeletonModification2D.md) rotates a bone to look a target. This is extremely helpful for moving character's head to look at the player, rotating a turret to look at a target, or any other case where you want to make a bone rotate towards something quickly and easily.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="SkeletonModification2DLookAt_property_bone2d_node"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[NodePath](NodePath.md) **bone2d_node** = `NodePath("")` [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModification2DLookAt_property_bone2d_node)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_bone2d_node**\ (\ value\: [NodePath](NodePath.md)\ )
- [NodePath](NodePath.md) **get_bone2d_node**\ (\ )

The [Bone2D](Bone2D.md) node that the modification will operate on.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModification2DLookAt_property_bone_index"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **bone_index** = `-1` [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModification2DLookAt_property_bone_index)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_bone_index**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_bone_index**\ (\ )

The index of the [Bone2D](Bone2D.md) node that the modification will operate on.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModification2DLookAt_property_target_nodepath"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[NodePath](NodePath.md) **target_nodepath** = `NodePath("")` [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModification2DLookAt_property_target_nodepath)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_target_node**\ (\ value\: [NodePath](NodePath.md)\ )
- [NodePath](NodePath.md) **get_target_node**\ (\ )

The NodePath to the node that is the target for the LookAt modification. This node is what the modification will rotate the [Bone2D](Bone2D.md) to.

## Method Descriptions

<a id="SkeletonModification2DLookAt_method_get_additional_rotation"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **get_additional_rotation**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModification2DLookAt_method_get_additional_rotation)

Returns the amount of additional rotation that is applied after the LookAt modification executes.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModification2DLookAt_method_get_constraint_angle_invert"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **get_constraint_angle_invert**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModification2DLookAt_method_get_constraint_angle_invert)

Returns whether the constraints to this modification are inverted or not.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModification2DLookAt_method_get_constraint_angle_max"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **get_constraint_angle_max**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModification2DLookAt_method_get_constraint_angle_max)

Returns the constraint's maximum allowed angle.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModification2DLookAt_method_get_constraint_angle_min"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **get_constraint_angle_min**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModification2DLookAt_method_get_constraint_angle_min)

Returns the constraint's minimum allowed angle.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModification2DLookAt_method_get_enable_constraint"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **get_enable_constraint**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModification2DLookAt_method_get_enable_constraint)

Returns ``true`` if the LookAt modification is using constraints.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModification2DLookAt_method_set_additional_rotation"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_additional_rotation**\ (\ rotation\: [float](float.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModification2DLookAt_method_set_additional_rotation)

Sets the amount of additional rotation that is to be applied after executing the modification. This allows for offsetting the results by the inputted rotation amount.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModification2DLookAt_method_set_constraint_angle_invert"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_constraint_angle_invert**\ (\ invert\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModification2DLookAt_method_set_constraint_angle_invert)

When ``true``, the modification will use an inverted joint constraint.

An inverted joint constraint only constraints the [Bone2D](Bone2D.md) to the angles *outside of* the inputted minimum and maximum angles. For this reason, it is referred to as an inverted joint constraint, as it constraints the joint to the outside of the inputted values.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModification2DLookAt_method_set_constraint_angle_max"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_constraint_angle_max**\ (\ angle_max\: [float](float.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModification2DLookAt_method_set_constraint_angle_max)

Sets the constraint's maximum allowed angle.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModification2DLookAt_method_set_constraint_angle_min"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_constraint_angle_min**\ (\ angle_min\: [float](float.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModification2DLookAt_method_set_constraint_angle_min)

Sets the constraint's minimum allowed angle.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModification2DLookAt_method_set_enable_constraint"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_enable_constraint**\ (\ enable_constraint\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModification2DLookAt_method_set_enable_constraint)

Sets whether this modification will use constraints or not. When ``true``, constraints will be applied when solving the LookAt modification.
